alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 25 at 8:26AM CDT until March 25 at 9:15AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 915 AM CDT. * At 826 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Taylor, or near Dothan, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dothan, Taylor, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Malvern, Rehobeth, Avon, Gordon, Memphis, Pansey, Sigma, Enon, Wilson Mill, Barber, Pleasant Plains, Light and Farley Nuclear Plant. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
